name: 0x01_black_pixel.lf (engineer edition)
description: A single black pixel, written in LOGO (1967) and drawn with IBM LOGO (1983) on an IBM PC XT (5160) with 256Kb RAM and a CGA display. Inspired by 0x01.logo which is part of my xterm-16color collection on OpenSea. This is the “engineer” edition which is the full 2.5 minute original director’s cut. You’ll enjoy this if you’re into code history and have a lot of patience. See objkt #90894 and #90895 for time compressed versions.
